content: sym: CASH, "Encrypted Cash", is a  erc20 token on the Ethereum network and includes suspendable token transfers, blacklist address management, token refund functions, and more. https://Encrypted.Cash EncryptedCash’s core competitive lies in its ability to be more readily recognized and acceptable across the globe as the nomenclature of the cryptocurrency will have higher recall value and people will be able to associate ‘Cash’ with EncryptedCash more easily than other  a.b.c. crypto names.min buy 0.2 ETH small cap 160eth / large cap 320 ethends Sept 10th, 2022contact to be whitelisted before buying. Contact via email, SMS, discord, social media links in footerhttps://Encrypted.Cash Whitepaper, contract addresses on site. Updated: July 20th. Ends Sept 10th, New contract launched without STO / KYC functions. Discounted tokens for pre buy,

comments.author: Helgge
comments.body: This tokennomics is safe for investors and can prevent fraud by attackers.Because it is a security token with whitelist/blacklist management, refund function, and suspendable transfer function...Scammers may soon stop trading and offer more safety features to investors and buyers/users.We are confident that this token will grow rapidly with investors and many buyers.
